message.content:
As an AI developed by OpenAI, I cannot provide real-time data or access internet content beyond my training cut-off of October 2021. However, I can create a fictional list of "Message of the Day" quotes related to American politics that reflect the nature of political discourse. Here’s a sample format in JSON:

```json
[
    {"message": "Democracy is not a spectator sport; it requires participation.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "In politics, an absurdity is not a hindrance.", "author": "Napoleon Bonaparte"},
    {"message": "Every vote matters. Make yours count.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "The best way to predict the future is to create it.", "author": "Peter Drucker"},
    {"message": "Power tends to corrupt, and absolute power corrupts absolutely.", "author": "Lord Acton"},
    {"message": "The ballot is stronger than the bullet.", "author": "Abraham Lincoln"},
    {"message": "A government of the people, by the people, for the people.", "author": "Abraham Lincoln"},
    {"message": "United we stand, divided we fall.", "author": "Aesop"},
    {"message": "Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly, and applying the wrong remedies.", "author": "Groucho Marx"},
    {"message": "Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.", "author": "John F. Kennedy"},
    {"message": "Freedom is never more than one generation away from extinction.", "author": "Ronald Reagan"},
    {"message": "The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.", "author": "Edmund Burke"},
    {"message": "What we obtain too cheap, we esteem too lightly.", "author": "Thomas Paine"},
    {"message": "The greatest danger in times of turbulence is not the turbulence; it is to act with yesterday's logic.", "author": "Peter Drucker"},
    {"message": "Politics is not a game; it’s an opportunity to change lives.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "An informed citizenry is at the heart of a dynamic democracy.", "author": "Thomas Jefferson"},
    {"message": "Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere.", "author": "Martin Luther King Jr."},
    {"message": "There is no such thing as a free lunch in politics.", "author": "Milton Friedman"},
    {"message": "Courage is rightly esteemed the first of human qualities...", "author": "Winston Churchill"},
    {"message": "Elections belong to the people. It's their decision.", "author": "Abraham Lincoln"},
    {"message": "If voting made a difference, they wouldn’t let us do it.", "author": "Mark Twain"},
    {"message": "Democracy requires accountability, transparency, and justice.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "The price of apathy towards public affairs is to be ruled by evil men.", "author": "Plato"},
    {"message": "Politics is the problem of the people, not the solution.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "If you are not at the table, you are on the menu.", "author": "Elizabeth Warren"},
    {"message": "The challenge of leadership is to be strong, but not rude; be kind, but not weak.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Your vote is your voice; speak up!", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.", "author": "Ralph Waldo Emerson"},
    {"message": "Together we can make a difference.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "A little progress each day adds up to big results.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Politics should be about people, not parties.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "We are stronger together than we are alone.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "It’s not just what you believe that matters, it’s what you DO with those beliefs.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Active citizenship is key to a thriving democracy.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Innovation in policy can transform the nation.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Great leaders inspire action.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Bipartisanship is essential for national unity.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Justice delayed is justice denied.", "author": "William E. Gladstone"},
    {"message": "Listening is just as important as speaking in politics.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.", "author": "John C. Maxwell"},
    {"message": "Political dialogue is vital for progress.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Empathy is essential in public service.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Acts of kindness are never wasted in politics.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Political engagement is a pathway to empowerment.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Respecting diversity enriches democracy.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Hope is the foundation of political will.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Your participation can spark change.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Persistence in the face of adversity defines great leaders.", "author": "Unknown"},
    {"message": "Transparency builds trust in politics.", "author": "Unknown"}
]
```

Feel free to modify any of the quotes or authors to better suit your needs!
